players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Everyone, Alice was killed last night, which means the mafia is still among us. We need to be careful with our accusations and voting to avoid losing more town members."
You: "Since Alice was killed last night, we need to figure out who among us is suspicious. Diana, you’ve been quiet so far—do you have any thoughts on who might be the mafia?"
Diana: "Diana here. I have information that can help us: I investigated Charlie last night, and he is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest him today before he can kill another town member."
Diana: "Diana again. Charlie is the confirmed mafia. We must vote to arrest him now to protect Bob and ourselves. Any hesitation helps the mafia win."
You: "Thank you, Diana, for your information. If Charlie is truly the mafia, we should vote to arrest him immediately to keep us safe."
Charlie: "That’s a bold claim, Diana, but it’s suspicious how quickly you’re pushing to arrest me without any proof other than your word. Bob, are you sure you want to trust her so easily?"
